patthana1.22:8.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.22:8.2: ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.22:8.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.22:9.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.22:9.2: bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe … paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.22:11.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … pe …
patthana1.22:14.1: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha dve), avigate dve.
patthana1.22:19.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.22:19.2: ahetukaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.22:19.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.22:19.10: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.22:20.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.22:20.2: ahetukaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.22:20.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.22:22.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.22:22.3: arūpe ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana1.22:23.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.22:23.2: arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe ….
patthana1.22:24.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.22:26.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) …
patthana1.22:27.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.22:27.2: pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana1.22:27.7: arūpe ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.22:28.1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.22:28.2: arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.22:31.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane nakamme navipāke najhāne namagge navippayutte dve.
patthana1.22:34.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dve … pe … navipāke dve, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.22:37.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve … pe … magge dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.22:45.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:45.2: ajjhattārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:45.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:46.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:48.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:48.2: ajjhattaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ … pe …
patthana1.22:48.11: Ariyā ajjhattārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.22:48.12: Ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.22:48.17: Ajjhattārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:49.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:49.3: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ bahiddhā dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ … pe …
patthana1.22:49.11: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, ajjhattārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe …
patthana1.22:49.13: cetopariyañāṇena ajjhattārammaṇabahiddhācittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ajjhattārammaṇā bahiddhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:50.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:50.2: bahiddhārammaṇaṃ bahiddhā dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:50.12: Bahiddhārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe …
patthana1.22:50.15: Bahiddhārammaṇā bahiddhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:51.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:51.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:51.3: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, bahiddhārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.22:51.4: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ …
patthana1.22:51.10: bahiddhārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.22:51.15: Bahiddhārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:53.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:53.4: ajjhattaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:53.5: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.22:53.14: ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.22:54.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:55.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:55.3: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā … pe …
patthana1.22:55.7: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.22:55.14: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, bahiddhārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.22:57.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:57.2: purimā purimā ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ajjhattārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:58.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:58.2: ajjhattārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ bahiddhārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:58.3: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ bahiddhārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:58.4: Ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā bahiddhārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:59.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:59.2: purimā purimā bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ bahiddhārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:60.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:60.2: bahiddhārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ ajjhattārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:60.3: Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ajjhattārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:60.4: Bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā ajjhattārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:62.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.22:62.3: sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:64.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:64.5: ajjhattārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā, ajjhattārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:65.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:65.5: ajjhattārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā bahiddhārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:66.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:66.5: bahiddhārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā bahiddhārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:67.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:67.5: bahiddhārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā ajjhattārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:69.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:69.2: purimā purimā ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ajjhattārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:70.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:70.2: ajjhattārammaṇaṃ anulomaṃ gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:71.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:71.2: purimā purimā bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ bahiddhārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:73.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:73.4: ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:73.8: ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ ajjhattārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:74.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:74.3: ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ bahiddhārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:75.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.22:75.4: bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:75.8: bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ bahiddhārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:76.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:76.3: bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ ajjhattārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:78.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.22:78.3: āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:81.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke dve … pe … (sabbattha dve), sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate dve.
patthana1.22:84.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:85.1: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:86.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.22:87.1: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.22:91.1: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha cattāri), napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane … pe … navippayutte cattāri … pe … noavigate cattāri.
patthana1.22:94.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye naāsevane nakamme … pe … nonatthiyā novigate dve.
patthana1.22:97.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke dve … pe … sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate dve.
